{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=1991 |Team=California Golden Bears |Image= |Conference=Pacific-10 Conference |Division= |ShortConference=Pac-10 |Record= 10-2-0 |ConfRecord= 6-2-0 |CoachRank=7 |APRank=8 |HeadCoach=[[Bruce Snyder]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |Stadium= |Champion=Florida Citrus Bowl champions |BowlTourney={{alternate links|1992 Florida Citrus Bowl|Florida Citrus Bowl|title=Florida Citrus Bowl}} |BowlTourneyResult= Win, 37-13, [[1991 Clemson Tigers football team|Clemson]] }} {{1991 Pacific-10 football standings}} The 1991 California Golden Bears represented the University of California-Berkeley. The Golden Bears scored 443 points while the defense allowed 239 points. Led by head coach Bruce Snyder, the Golden Bears participated in the Florida Citrus Bowl.
